uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data

Class DataCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.DataCache<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of key
    V - type of data
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexedDataCache, IndexedReferenceDataCache

    public abstract class DataCache<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    DataCache implements caches round queries that will be repeated multiple times, e.g. username lookups. It caches the results so later identical queries do no have to go to the DB Concrete subclasses will usually be inner classes of a Factory class
    Author:
    spb
